question: The Ransthamb that was recently in the news is in which state?
explanation: Ransthamb is a memorial to the Bhima-Koregaon battle in Maharashtra. It is also known as Jaistambh or victory pillar. It is located in Bhima Koregaon village in Pune. It was visited by many in light of the 202<sup>nd</sup> anniversary of the Bhima Koregaon battle that was fought in 1818.
